definition: mien/bearing/grace/amorous feelings/flirtatious expressions/local conditions and customs/wind force, direction etc
storm/violent commotion/fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)

sentences.english: Bamboo water side edge loose stone, a good ten years ago in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 石邊流水竹邊松，中有十年前好風。

sentences.english: The wind has blown apples down.
Why should the wind do his bidding? The wind is just wind.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼風要爲他服務呢？，風就是風。

sentences.english: Why should the wind do his bidding? The wind is just wind.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼風要爲他服務呢？，風就是風。

sentences.english: The strongest , fastest winds of a hurricane are found in the eyewall.
sentences.chinese: 最強勁最快速的風在颶風的眼壁中。

sentences.english: A strong wind blows the beer can into the river.
sentences.chinese: 一陣強大的風把啤酒罐吹到了河裏面了。

sentences.english: A big thunder, lightning a good light, the wind is also very fierce.
sentences.chinese: 雷聲好大，閃電好亮，風也很猛。

sentences.english: Heavy wind at the time was another factor.
sentences.chinese: 當時的風颳得很大是引起這樣大火勢的另一個因素。

sentences.english: The wind fell little red, winter cold.
sentences.chinese: 風捲落紅點點，冬意清寒。

sentences.english: In the dark pines the wind disentangles itself.
sentences.chinese: 在松樹的陰影下，風放開自己。

sentences.english: There is wind everyday in this summer, and there are masses of clouds floating in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 這個夏天每天都有風，並且有大片的雲彩飄來飄去。

sentences.english: Warm breezes index the approach of spring.
sentences.chinese: 溫暖的和風表明春天的到來。

sentences.english: And somewhere shining snow polished by the wind.
sentences.chinese: 某處被風拋光的雪閃耀着光芒。

sentences.english: The gentle wind, blowing open your petty brow tight, so fly back all the worry.
sentences.chinese: 輕輕的風，吹開你緊瑣的眉頭，讓所有的愁向後飛去。

sentences.english: Circulated air design keeps shower area clean in non-shower state.
sentences.chinese: 循環風設計，保證非吹淋狀態下風淋區內的潔淨度。

sentences.english: The wind caught her hair, and it streamed out behind her.
sentences.chinese: 風颳得她的頭髮向後面飄擺。

wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
dawn/daybreak/to know/to let sb know/to make explicit
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
